summary: We’ve reached a little over 400 followers recently!! Sorry for the long wait about this but since we’ve reached such a big...
body:
We’ve reached a little over 400 followers recently!! Sorry for the long wait about this but since we’ve reached such a big amount of followers we’ve decided to put together a little giveaway!

There will be three winners!

The first place winner will get two wallpapers and three icons with a character or ship of your choice.

Second place winner will get a banner and two icons, character/ship of your choice.

Third place will get three icons with the character of their choice.

You can choose a mod to make these edits for you if you want to but that’s up to our winners!

The giveaway will last until the 19th, reblog/like will both count as an entry but please don’t reblog this post more than once in a single day.

Please have your ask/DMs open so we can contact the winners!!

blog.name: redcxnviction
blog.title: Stained
blog.description: Closed Stain of MHA affiliated with the Plus Ultra RP Group

summary: Stain's mortal enemies are fake heroes, villains, and cosmetic retailers like Lush and The Body Shop. His lack of nose means...
body:
Stain’s mortal enemies are fake heroes, villains, and cosmetic retailers like Lush and The Body Shop. His lack of nose means that he has little to no filter for bad crap and strong smells in the air. Masks don’t help. Every time he walks by one of those shops he feels like he’s being gassed by the fumes of lavender and orange peel wafting out the doors.

E.g.:

Stain, walking through a mall: Maybe I should try out that new restaurant that just opened, it looks – *CHOKE* *HACK* *COUGH* Crap! Lush! Damn those bastards…!

reblog.comment:

blog.description: Yo!! Patreon information can be found HERE!! Again, this isn't required for the blog, but it's an amazing way to support us further and get some amazing perks! ASK BOX FOR SCENARIOS AND HEADCANONS: CLOSED!!! ASK BOX FOR MATCHUPS: OPEN EVERYDAY!!! Current post Schedule: 2-3 posts from 5:00PM EST to 9:00PM EST!!!! BNHA blog here, ready to deliver some delightful scenarios, random posts I enjoy, and everything in between! Rules can be found HERE! If you have any questions, please go ahead and ask! MASTERLIST can be found HERE!!! ~ Admin HeroWeekly (OG), Admin Bomb, Admin Blue, Admin Eun, Admin Peaches, Admin Lyssa, and Admin Jorts!!!

summary: Could I ask for some headcanons on how Iida would deal with an s/o who is super ‘rebellious’ and rowdy and likes to ignore the...
question: Could I ask for some headcanons on how Iida would deal with an s/o who is super ‘rebellious’ and rowdy and likes to ignore the rules a little. They never force him, but they always try to drag him to go get food past curfew, tries to sneak into the pool at night, always asks if they can sleep in his dorm, tries to convince him to sleep in and cuddle, steals his clothes, etc. Plus they go a little overboard with PDA and cuddles all the time. They mean well though and love him so much. Thanks!💙💙
answer:
Helloo, I’m Lyssa (also known as Alyssa), one of the admins for this account, this is my first time writing for it, so I’m super excited! I’m still a bit new to the headcannons thing so I’m sorry if it turns out bad! 

~Admin Lyssa

- When they first met, he wasn’t all too appreciative of his S/O, mostly because they were rebellious against almost anything an adult or anyone said, but did it with style. 

- They always knock on his dorm door, so lightly not even Jiro could hear using her quirk, so they’d eventually have to knock harder. 

- He typically answers in an annoyed/excited state due to his S/O, ready for a snack hunt. 

- They almost always end with him coming along and you both end up getting caught for how loud he “whispers” or him not even coming. 

- Sometimes they go overboard and force him to sneak into the pool with them, they always get caught.

-  They got caught so much Aizawa has begun to put “NO TENYA IIDA AND (Y/N) (L/N) ALLOWED AFTER DARK.” around, it just excites them more. 

- Sometimes the late night visits are just when they want to cuddle and take his clothes, those pleads are too hard to resist for him, and always gives into their needy ways.

-  When in public they go over the top, trying to sneak as much PDA into the day as possible, his red face always makes them smirk and encourages them to do more of it. 

- “S-stop that (Y/N), it is not appropriate when in public!” 

- Still does it.

-  But even though they embarrass him to no end, they love him dearly, and would do anything for him, just to see that proud look on his face.

reblog.comment:
